reviews.title: It was just OK
reviews.text: The following is my review for the BENMILLER INN, located in Goderich, Ontario and considered a four diamond facility by "Ontario's Finest Inn's". Leading up to our anniversary weekend visit to the Inn, I was unable to locate any detailed reviews for the establishment and went strictly on a couple recommendations from co-workers. This is the reason I post to your site today, to give a better understanding of the Inn and the individuals it best caters to.
